definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The two girls sat in a corner exchanging confidences .
sentences.chinese: 那两个女孩子坐在角落里说著悄悄话。

sentences.english: She once heard him whisper to another girl.
sentences.chinese: 她曾听到他对另外一个女孩说悄悄话。

sentences.english: Players will no longer be able to whisper to enemy players in Battlegrounds.
sentences.chinese: 玩家在战场中不可以和敌对玩家悄悄话了。

sentences.english: The girls whispered and gigged together.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们说着悄悄话，一路咯咯地笑。

sentences.english: I was whispering into her mouth.
We play games after the meal, aditya whisper to the game.
sentences.chinese: 饭后大家做游戏，阿迪亚提了悄悄话的游戏。

sentences.english: I am your dog, and I have a little something I would like to whisper in your ear.
sentences.chinese: 我是你的狗狗，我有一些悄悄话想要和你说。

sentences.english: The boys whispering in the corner are brewing some mischief.
sentences.chinese: 那些在角落说悄悄话的男孩们正在企图搞鬼。

sentences.english: The men in the vehicle soon found their voices and began to talk in whispers.
sentences.chinese: 车里的人们很快又回过了神，开始说悄悄话。

sentences.english: Private messaging system so users can send private messages to each other.
sentences.chinese: 悄悄话系统，使用户可以发送私人讯息给对方。

sentences.english: He whispered endearments in her ear .
sentences.chinese: 他在她耳边说着悄悄话。

sentences.english: He whispered endearments in her ear.
sentences.chinese: 他在她耳边说著悄悄话。

definition: to discuss in whispered tones/whispered conversation
in a whisper/in a low voice (idiom)
casual conversation/chat/gossip/to talk about (whatever comes to mind)
(to express one's) true feelings/what is on one's mind/secret mind
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to whisper in sb's ear/a whisper
talking in one's sleep/words spoken during sleep/fig. speech bearing no relation to reality/delusions
to chat with a low voice
to bill and coo (idiom)/to whisper sweet nothings to one another/to be very much in love
